Mbape = Nejmar, čekamo odgovor iz Madrida
PSŽ ponudio mladom asu novi ugovor s primanjima poput Nejmarovih...

05 Nov 2019


Glasine da Real Madrid kreće po Kilijana Mbapea sve su glasnije. Florentinu Perezu očajnički je potrebna superzvezda kojom će zabašuriti loše rezultate Kraljevića od odlaska Kristijana Ronalda, a najbolji mladi igrač sveta nameće se kao logičan izbor za klub koji vapi za ozbiljnom rekonstrukcijom. 

Nije tajna da bi i Mbape rado put Madrida, pa je pitanje šta će Pari Sen Žermen moći da uradi kako bi sprečio već viđen transfer narednog leta.
O tome u današnjem izdanju piše Parizijen i navodi da se Sveci neće lako odreći svog ponajboljeg igrača. PSŽ renomeom sigurno ne može da parira Madriđanima, ali novcima može, pa će na taj način i dejstvovati kada je u pitanju borba za Mbapea.
► Don Florentino, vreme je
Plan? Plan je vrlo jednostavan. Nije tajna da poslednjih meseci postoji veliki animozitet između dve najveće zvezde na Parku prinčeva, te je uprava kluba rešila da da pokuša da smiri mlađeg. Kako? Tako što će njegova primanja izjednačiti s Nejmarovim. Mbapeu je čak savetovano u prethodnom periodu da ne razmišlja previše, već da poradi na svom transferu, pošto u klubu i dalje Nejmara video kao prvu zvezdu i vođu tima. Ali ako su izvori Parizijena u pravu, situacija nije baš tako jednostavna. 
Pariski dnevnik navodi da su s agentima igrača već kontaktirali iz kluba i da je predložen nastavak saradnje po poboljšanim uslovima. Naime, Mbapeu je ponuđen ugovor jednak Nejmarovom - 36.700.000 evra na godišnjem nivou. Uzimajući u obzir da francuski reprezentativac trenutno zarađuje oko 20.000.000 evra, radi se o ozbiljnom povećanju plate.
Biće zanimljivo videti odgovor Reala, koji teško može da parira s ovim sumama za platu, pošto bi visina eventualnog obeštećenja sasvim izvesno iznosila više od 200.000.000 evra. 

Foto: Reuters

Mbape = Neymar, we are waiting for a reply from Madrid
PSG offered young ace a new income contract like Neymar's ...

05 Nov 2019


The rumors that Real Madrid are following in the wake of Killian Mbape are growing louder. Florentine Perez is in desperate need of a superstar to stagger Kraljevic's poor performance since the departure of Christian Ronald, and the world's best young player is set as a logical choice for a club that is looking for a serious rebuild.

It is no secret that Mbape would also like to travel to Madrid, so the question is what Paris Saint-Germain can do to prevent the already-seen transfer next summer.
The Parisian writes about it in today's edition, stating that the Saints will not easily give up their best player. The PSG certainly can't match the Madrid players with money, but it can make money, so it will work when it comes to fighting for Mbape.
► Don Florentino, it's time
The plan? The plan is very simple. It's no secret that in recent months there has been a lot of animosity between the two biggest stars at Prince Park, so the club's management has decided to try to appease the younger one. How? By equating his income with Neymar's. Mbape was even advised in the previous period not to think too much but to work on his transfer, as he still saw Neymar as the first star and team leader at the club. But if Parisian sources are right, the situation is not quite so simple.
The Paris daily said that players' agents had already been contacted by the club and that it was proposed to continue cooperating under improved conditions. Namely, Mbape was offered a contract equal to Neymar's - 36.7 million euros annually. Considering that the French national team is currently earning around 20,000,000 euros, this is a serious pay raise.
It will be interesting to see the answer from Real, who can hardly match these sums for salary, since the amount of eventual compensation would certainly amount to more than 200,000,000 euros.
